Reviews.Title: “Outdated and No Frills but Very Clean!”
Reviews.Author: SEC219
Reviews.Content: This is an older, independent hotel. It is very very clean and the staff were all very friendly!! I have stayed at 4 star hotels that were not as clean as this was. I really can't complain about anything that reflects directly on the hotel. I could hear the plumbing (toilet and shower) of the room upstairs and the dumpster truck came rediculously early which woke me up at 5:45 am. However, the hotel can't control the city trash truck and when you stay in an old hotel you have to expect that there will be little noise insulation. They did have a free continental breakfast with fresh hot waffles, biscuits and gravy, cereal, yogurt, coffee, juice, donuts and some other things. The pool area was small but clean and appeared to be well taken care of and in working order. While most of the items in the room (furniture, television, etc) were old and basic the comforter was above average and there was a nice variety of pillows including throw pillows. I thought it was a nice touch. I wouldn't mind staying here again if we needed a clean and comfortable place to sleep after a long day of shopping and sightseeing; however I would probably look at somewhere newer and fancier for a special occasion trip.

Reviews.Title: “Good for the price, but not great”
Reviews.Author: Tawana B
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with my husband on our honeymoon. It was good for the price - $60 for a king size bed isn't bad. There was an outdoor pool, but not much else. We were at least expecting a mini fridge and microwave. If you're looking for a basic, cheap room, this is good, but not many features. The pool stayed open very late, so we heard little kids screaming and playing while we were trying to sleep after our long day at Silver Dollar City. All in all, average hotel for a decent price.

Reviews.Title: “Nice but with issues.”
Reviews.Author: Twila L
Reviews.Content: This motel was pretty nice once we got things straightened out. First thing when we went to the room, the beds were not made and there were cigarette wrappers/trash on floor. I called front desk and gentleman was very very polite and very apologetic. We got moved to a nice room and the beds were very comfortable. Was really quiet motel outside of the football team that was staying there. Continental breakfast very good, nice lady that ran it. Only other problem was the hot water, we had to wait 30 minutes one morning for the water to get semi warm so we could take showers. But it was nice motel overall and worth the money.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Julie H
Reviews.Content: This motel was very clean, inside and out. Great location. Staff was friendly. Pool was clean and was open till 11pm which was wonderful for a late swim after getting back from a long day on the strip. Continental breakfast was average. My only complainant is the lighting in the room, had to remove lamp shades to get more light. However I would definatly stay here again for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Good Clean Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: skbkjb
Reviews.Content: This motel is a very nice clean place to stay. The beds were very comfortable and it was a very quiet location. Easy to get in and out of as far as traffic and getting to other places. The staff members were very friendly. The breakfast was pretty good and the lady in that area was very friendly and even made your waffles for you. The pool was nice and clean. I would highly recommend this place.

Reviews.Title: “Dream”
Reviews.Author: Pastor101
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Dockers Inn because another hotel in Branson tried to scam us (Literally). We finally found this hotel after looking for over two hours- found a good deal online, and tried booking online, but battery died before we could finish putting in our credit card info. Went into the hotel, told the clerk, and without hesitation agreed to give us that rate- $20 less- for later that night. This was at 6 am in case you were wondering! Very good customer service! We had seen some pretty good reviews online, but at this point we would take almost anything that accepted pets. We walked into our room in total amazement- there was an actual comforter on the beds- instead of blankets like many hotels do- very homey atmosphere. Room was exceptionally clean, and beds were incredibly comfortable. I cannot think of one thing wrong with this hotel- we have stayed at many- and plenty in Branson, but this is absolutely in the top, maybe even our favorite. Rooms were very quiet as well. If you are looking into the possibility of staying here, look no further!! I have paid much more for less quality.

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleased”
Reviews.Author: Kara B
Reviews.Content: Very good budget motel. It was very clean and tidy. For people who aren't going to be in their rooms much this is a great choice. Beds are comfortable and the pool area is decent. The bathroom is a little small, but overall a very good choice and we would stay there again. The location is excellent. You never have to get on 76 if you don't want to!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Experience!”
Reviews.Author: kcvisitor
Reviews.Content: I had a fantastic stay over the Memorial Day weekend! The lady at the front desk was wonderful helping us check in as well as the lady who served us a great breakfast during our stay. The room was very comfortable and the beds were wonderful. I highly recommend Docker's Inn and will stay here again. I also enjoyed the attractions that were very close, especially Stone Hill Winery. Can't wait to come back!

Reviews.Title: “nice secret”
Reviews.Author: tonyLondon_Ohio
Reviews.Content: stayed here three times. Nice little place off the main roads, so getting in and out are easy. Nice pool, but I dont swim. You do have to rent a frig, but it is not a real inconvience not to have one. Clean and quiet

Reviews.Title: “OK MOTEL BUT BETTER CHEAPER PLACE ON THE SAME STREET”
Reviews.Author: marci477
Reviews.Content: The bed was extremely comfortable. The room was clean and I would recommend it if you don't mind the following: 1. NO small refrigerator in the rooms 2. NO microwave for late night snacks 3. NO business area where you can print out boarding passess. All of which you will find just up the road at Angel Inn for less money and is just as clean and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “30 ROOMS 3 NIGHTS-GREAT TIME!!”
Reviews.Author: Carolyn-78552
Reviews.Content: Texas retirement resort-- We had great service from Amy and Lisa- couldn't have done more to please a wide range of people. Rooms clean and Richard my housekeeper was very good & prompt. Prices & location to activities are very good and convenient. I am a retired Motel/Hotel Manager & notice negative things fairly quickly!! Will be planning next year soon-same time of year-SAME PLACE!-Carolyn Cumbie, Harlingen, TX.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT STAY”
Reviews.Author: Chuck S
Reviews.Content: We go to Branson about 2-4 times a year. Usually stay at Grand Victorian Inn. Decided this time we would try to save some money on room. Booked room through Orbitz. We were surprised when we got there. Room was just what was described. Clean, nice furnishings and comfortable beds. The AC in the room was awesome. Temps were 100's that week and our room was COLD! We were on the third floor in the back and it was quite. Slept late several mornings. Asked for extra towels twice and received them within 15 minutes both times. Breakfast is only area we found lacking. Another big plus is its location. You can get to anywhere in Branson in 10-15 min. from here. Just take the time to learn the secondary routes. We go for x-mas every other year and we will definitely be staying at Dockers Inn this year.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: SOMODAD
Reviews.Content: The rooms were clean, breakfast was great and the staff makes you feel right at home. Ill be back!

Reviews.Title: “Was wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: lannoe
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very clean, staff was great, beds were wonderful. The hot breakfast was awesome! Easy to get too and safe.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you paid for”
Reviews.Author: scottllee
Reviews.Content: We were looking for an inexpensive hotel for our family of 5 for one night. After dropping the kids off at camp, we planned on staying another couple nights. We liked the price...and the fact that we could use a roll-away for the 5th person for only $5. My first clue should have been the price for this hotel was better than any we had seen for the weekend. There were very few rooms booked for the weekend, but somehow the hotel managed to put our room right next one with barking dogs. You'd think with 80% of the rooms open they would have put the family with dogs somewhere else. When we complained, management said "Call us at 10:00 if the dogs are still barking." We have young children who need to be in bed well before 10:00. It also appears the hotel has no policy on quite time, because this same family played LOUDLY in the pool right outside our window until after 10:30. When they got back to their rooms, the dogs started up again. When the hotel finally brought the roll-away, there were no sheets for the bed, just a blanket. I asked the hotel manager if we could get some sheets. His response was that is what the blanket was for. I guess he planned on my kid sleeping on the mattress without any sheets. It was rather hard for me to understand how he couldn't find a sheet in a hotel which was relatively empty. (he did finally hunt down a sheet after I pressed a couple more times). The lock on our door also didn't work. The hotel sent a maintenance man at 8:00 a.m. to fix it -- while we were still sleeping! Save yourself some headache and pay a little extra to go somewhere else!

Reviews.Title: “A GREAT PLACE TO STAY AND GREAT ROOMS”
Reviews.Author: ThomasWaverlyMO
Reviews.Content: We travel to Branson every year for a fun little weekend trip. I have to say that this is one of the friendest and nicest places to stay. After shopping and running around all day taking in the sights, it was nice to be able to stay close to the strip and have it so nice and quite. I must say that the beds were WONDERFUL. They were nice and firm. I would highly recommend Dockers Inn to anyone that will listen.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay..Great Value”
Reviews.Author: tjohnstonjr
Reviews.Content: I went to Branson on business and just picked Dockers Inn out of the blue. The value was excellent and the staff was very helpful. I like the location because it was out of the traffic yet close to the strip. Also my bed was very comfortable. I highly recommend for a good clean room with good value.

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant winter get away”
Reviews.Author: Kathy44600
Reviews.Content: My husband and I want to get away for the long holiday weekend. For February in Missouri the weekend was good. There wasn't a lot of shows open and shops closed early, but knew that before we came. The hotel staff was pleasant and breakfast waffles were good.

Reviews.Title: “Glad We Chose Dockers!”
Reviews.Author: rlynbos
Reviews.Content: We were in Branson for a leisure trip after the holidays and decided on Dockers because of the reviews and the price. With the location on Green Mountain Drive, so close to everthing we were interested in (wineries, the strip, Table Rock Dam, the hatchery, and the Titanic museum, we were very pleased with Dockers Inn. Given the off season, they booked everyone's room near the breakfast room, but leaving, at least, a room in between for privacy. We booked a king and the pillow top mattress bed was soooo comfortable with a nice comforter and pillows, very clean and affordable at $95 for two nights. It was also nice to have a few trees about the property and along the Stone Castle drive that were lit up at night which provided a cozy atmosphere. We plan on Dockers again in the on season when we can enjoy the fantastic buffet breakfast next door at their restaurant!

Reviews.Title: “Voted to come back for the fourth year”
Reviews.Author: fgilley
Reviews.Content: We have about 20 to 30 people who return to Branson each year for the past 3 years and voted to come back to Branson next year. We use the breakfast area in the evening for gift exchange and our Christmas Party. We are a group of High School friends who get together every couple months for lunch and we call ourselves the EHS Lunch Bunch. I would take this opportunity to recommend this Motel for small parties as unlike other motels they are so friendly and helpful. They do not charge for the room for us to have our party. We had no complaints from any of our group and would recommend this hotel to anyone. Lisa Hart and her staff are very helpful in arranging our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: edetdiehl
Reviews.Content: We held our Military Reunion October 5,6,7 2010 at Dockers Inn. Had 25 total people, the stay was great, management treated us very well. Would recommend it to individuals or groups. The breakfast was great.

Reviews.Title: “The pillow top beds are wonderful.”
Reviews.Author: abransonfan
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Docker's on three separate times and each time the rooms are clean and comfortable and the staff is very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Overall nice place but did find roach in coffee maker”
Reviews.Author: WarsawDog
Reviews.Content: Good location off the main strip. The outside looked very clean and freshly painted. No problems checking in at the front desk. Examined the room closer than usual due to the discount price. The room appeared clean and I felt pretty good about my decision. WiFi worked fine. Later on I started to get the coffee maker ready for the next morning. Opening the lid to pour in water I discovered a dead roach laying on his back. I took the coffee maker to the front desk and they exchanged it for another. Didn't appear to be a big deal to them. Normally I would give kind of situation a negative rating but the overall experience was good and would probably stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Not sure we'd stay there again”
Reviews.Author: candycorn59
Reviews.Content: We chose Docker's Inn based on Tripadvisor reviews. While the price may have been right we encountered several issues. Upon check in I asked the clerk if wi-fi was available in guest rooms, the answer was yes. I was not able to connect to wi-fi once, connecting to internet on my cell phone was nearly impossible (even using my internet provider) . This trip was for relaxation, the first night we put out the do not disturb sign and did not rise until 10:30 the next morning, left the room about 11am for the day. When we came back to the room late that night we found our room had not been cleaned. The front desk checked notes indicating the housekeeper found the do not disturb sign on the door about 11am, the housekeeper should have checked back but obviously didn't. The air conditioner unit blew directly on us as were laying in bed, in addition there seemed to be no way to control the fan, it seemed to kick on and off at it's own discretion. On our final morning, my husband was putting bags in the car, I made one last check of the room, as I began to pull the door shut the bed headboard fell off the wall!

Reviews.Title: “Go Elsewhere!”
Reviews.Author: oktravelchick
Reviews.Content: We had 2 rooms side-by-side. One room was continuously filled with flies, while other was not. Asked for fly swat, they said they did not have one but would spray down with chemicals........uh, no thanks. Bought fly swat. Pool filled constantly with kids, and since it was open until 11pm, always loud, rambunctious kids running and screaming. Got up for showers in morning....every day got colder, until 4th day was like showering in ice cubes at 8am. When earlier or later, temperature was somewhat better - just not adequate hot water for all guests. Not good! Breakfast was so-so: donuts (one day was out of donuts at 9am though breakfast served until 10am), toast/english muffins, cereals, and make your own waffles - be prepared to wait in line as only one maker and it takes 2 mins for each waffle made. Breakfast also comes with 'entertainment', a lady singing 'southern gospel' on kareoke machine seemingly every other day (was there on Wed. & Fri). Both of our rooms needed simple fixes, like the electric outlet by the table & chairs was so old, computer plug-ins would not say in outlet, and my outlet cover was completely off & dangling off lamp cord. Desk staff are not friendly either. Standard a/c units that seem to go off & on by themselves - do not run constantly with fan, just shut off altogether so you hear all the noise outside; also was not consistent on temperatures: ie: you could get frozen solid on just over half the 'dial', and when it shut off, you could turn it all the way to coldest and it would NEVER turn back on for half an hour or longer. Ridiculous! Also, some spots on nightstands had not been dusted since....who knows when- But they are the first to give you envelopes for tipping the pitiful cleaning staff! Saw same sort of looking places for half the price. Don't bother!

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel for families”
Reviews.Author: RobbiesMomOK
Reviews.Content: We chose Dockers Inn for our recent trip to Branson. We were very pleased with our stay. The best part about the rooms were the beds...They were amazing! The pool was so much fun for my 9 year old and very well maintained. I was impressed with the breakfast, considering what we paid for our room. We weren't expecting much and we were pleasantly surprised by the variety. All of the employees we encountered were friendly and helpful. There are 2 mini golf courses on same road as hotel and my son really enjoyed the Dinosaur themed one. We will definately stay here the next time we are in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Extemely satisfied with our stay”
Reviews.Author: cndylouwhooo
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean, going barefooted I never soiled the bottom of my feet, that says a lot about the cleanliness of a room. The beds are new Sealy pillow tops with luxurious bedding and lots of pillows. I understand the older mattresses are now in a name brand hotel up the street. Pay for a name brand, get an older mattress, stay at Dockers and get the best. And for $50.00 a night through Orbits it was the best price I could find for the time. They zone the streets,red, yellow, blue, for mapping and Dockers or any hotel on yellow or Green mountain rd looked clean and well maintained and just off the strip. The red zone or 76 was crowded and due to traffic I would not recommend. If you are a smoker you will find all the hotels in Branson are non smoking but Dockers does accommodate you with benches outside of your room and smoking allowed on the premises. This is important to know since some do not allow smoking on the property and can actually fine you if you smoke in there rooms. The free breakfast was always enough for us. Cake doughnuts, toast, English muffins, 4 types of cereal, make your own waffles with regular and sugar free syrup, coffee, orange juice, apple juice, milk and hot chocolate mix. The coffee pots in the rooms make 1 6oz cup of coffee with these special packs so bringing coffee will not help. If you ask they will supply all the coffee you need. The Dockers restaurant across the parking lot may not look great on the outside but is very clean and appealing inside with an all you can eat breakfast, lunch and dinner, with breakfast for 4.99 and lunch for 5.99. They also offered meals like burger's and fries for 5.99, or liver and onions my favorite for under 10.00. You can purchase 2 day passes for Silver dollar city for the price of 1 day and other discount tickets through this hotel and they will deliver to you an actual ticket not a voucher which I suggest. SHOPPING AND SIGHT SEEING: Branson is the equivalent to the Christian Disney Land and if your patriotic and love singing then you will have a great time. If this would offend you, I suggest you do not go to Branson at all. From the pledging allegiance to the American flag at the Branson Mall, to the Christian singing at your morning breakfast, it is Southern hospitality at it's best. We took the private cave tour offered at Silver dollar city which is by lantern for an extra $10.00 at the end of the day. They offer free tours throughout the day but this one is for only 20 guests lit only by lanterns, if you are physically fit and are not claustrophobic you may love the experience. Yes there are bat's flying around, I suggest wearing good walking shoes and carry a jacket. You will need to be able to walk squatting or bent over many times to fit through the caverns so be prepared. BEWARE of timeshares unless your into the whole free or discount tickets for 90 minutes of your time, they are everywhere. I heard these tours are high pressured sales, and more like 2 hours out of your life, many people must get roped in since there are lot's of places re-selling them. I understand the purple building on 76 across from the fire house does offer tickets at 2 for 1 with no strings attached. I suggest checking them out first or just pay the price with a coupon that you can find in any brochure down there rather than give up 2 hours of your vacation. The blue route did offer an Amish store along with some souvenirs like 4 t-shirts for $10.00 and a VF discount store at the shops of Branson meadows where we found new clothing for under 5.00.

Reviews.Title: “Great pet-friendly hotel”
Reviews.Author: mimimingo
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a 4 night stay at Dockers Inn. We took our 13 year old granddaughter and our small dog. The employees were the friendliest people I've ever dealt with, from the lady at the front desk to the housekeepers. They always had a smile, greeted us with a warm hello, and an answer to any of our questions. The bed was very comfortable and the room was spotless. The pool area was clean and a good size. The breakfast was not spectacular but it was adequate. The room was very quiet in comparison to other hotels we've stayed at. This will be our hotel of choice for our future stays in Branson. Close enough to the 'strip' without staying right on it.

Reviews.Title: “Very disappointing...”
Reviews.Author: Roni48
Reviews.Content: We were disappointed with our three nights at Dockers July 19-21. The room was not vacuumed in corners & at walls, dust was thick on headboards and also when I went to plug their clock radio behind nightstand. Clock radio gained half hour overnight,. And TV remote did not work, nor did the one they replaced it with. We stayed off-site near the pool area. When discussed with staff, she replied "we haven't had a housekeeping complaint in 3 months", which I found hard to believe. The location was good and the pool area nice. Thee Sunday evening buffet in the restaurant was pretty "common".; but the breakfast buffet in the restaurant was better.

Reviews.Title: “Updated,Clean & worth the money”
Reviews.Author: ozarkfun
Reviews.Content: We usually stay at a different hotel but it was booked so we tried this one and we will probably stay here from now on. It was clean and updated with all amenities provided. The only thing I can say is that if you like to sleep in make sure you put the do not disturb sign out so the maids won't bother you. They liked to come early so if your like us just put out the sign. The breakfast was ok, I wish they would have a bit more but it was your usual cereal,donuts, and waffles. You won't be disappointed if you stay here. Also this is a pet friendly hotel, which we love dogs but the ones next to us liked to bark when the owners were gone.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and quiet”
Reviews.Author: tireddriver_10
Reviews.Content: We arrived at this sparkling clean location in the early evening. There were roofers fixing storm damage on the property who were careful to let us know that they would stop in the early evening. Everything looked very clean. The rooms were nicely furnished and the $50 rate we got was a deal. The motel filled up after we checked in, but it was quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Loved Our Stay at Docker's Inn”
Reviews.Author: kimberjack1
Reviews.Content: I am a single Mom that planned and read reviews of lots of hotels. I picked the Dockers Inn. I am soo glad i did...The room was comfortable and clean. The beds were very comfortable. Staff was very friendly, from check-in desk to maid service to the lady who takes care of the breakfast room. Outdoor pool was very nice and clean. Great location. easy access to majority of the highly attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: flyaway005
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay very much. Rooms were pretty clean and comfortable. The breakfast was supper, fresh fruit, coffee and juice, cereals and waffles. nice pool and close to all the attractions. We would definatley stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Leaking faucet.”
Reviews.Author: twotravelers1102
Reviews.Content: The pillow top beds were excellent. Too bad the sink did not drain well and leaked out on to the carpet. Faucet was also broken.

Reviews.Title: “Value and an Excellent Nights Sleep”
Reviews.Author: Darkikay
Reviews.Content: My husband and I pre-reserved two nights at Docker's Inn based on trip advisor reviews, and we were not disappointed. My cat was very sick, and we needed to leave a day later. The hotel was great about it and didn't charge us a fee for missing the first night. When we checked in, we found a comfy room with an amazingly comfortable mattress. Breakfast was extended - I had a waffle, and the hostess was a sweetie. It was a great value, and we both slept soundly. It isn't the Bellagio, but it is the best budget hotel I've been to in awhile.

Reviews.Title: “This Hotel is AMAZING! Recommend to EVERYONE!”
Reviews.Author: midnite12
Reviews.Content: This hotel had a very cheap price, so we were worried that it wouldnt be as nice as some of the other ones. Boy were we wrong! The staff was friendly, the rooms were clean with new comfy pillow top mattresses, there was a free computer to use in the lobby, and the continental breakfast had just about any food you can imagine: toast, bagels, oatmeal, tea, coffee, juice, cereal, donuts, and even make your own waffles! Amazing hotel for the price. I would recommend it to anyone and we would definitely not hesitate to stay there again. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: Splashofcolor
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive, clean, nice breakfast & great location! How can you go wrong with that?

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Fantastic Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: pedro1095
Reviews.Content: I made my first visit to the USA 28 Jan to 8 Feb 2010 I am from the Stockton on Tees England Staying at The Dockers Inn Branson (29 Jan to 7 Feb) driving all day arriving late evening Well what can I say Arrived tired and worn out My first meeting with the staff was Fantastic from the first moment To be met with the warmest and friendliest greeting by 3 young ladies With a smile to brighten anyones lives The rooms service was excellent cleaner visited everyday changing towels etc etc I could not have got a better service in any 5 Star Hotel than I got from Dockers It made what was my dream holiday to the USA A dream come true Even the people of Branson where so pleasant and polite What a Fantastic place to visit Making Dockers the place to stay for anyone visiting Branson Would be my priority I certainly hope to visit Branspon again as there is so much to do and see Making sure it will be another fantastic dream will mean I Shall Be Staying At DOCKERS INN Again So to the people of Branson I say Thank You You make The USA a place to visit Dockers Inn You make it clean comfortable and Affordable With a First Class service So I hope to see you all again Soon Thank You Peter

Reviews.Title: “Christmas in Branson”
Reviews.Author: BandBAdventures
Reviews.Content: Huge room,but we had a problem with ants,it we would not have a trouble with ants this was a steal of a deal.

Reviews.Title: “A value of a find!!”
Reviews.Author: gloreeT
Reviews.Content: We had spent two nights in another well known hotel but wanted to stay one more day so we got Dockers through Hotwire. I expected a letdown ---- instead a very pleasant surprise was in store for us. A very clean room, wonderful, wonderful beds that provided the comfort we so missed in the other place, a free breakfast served to us by a delightful senior citizen lady and a QUIET, peaceful night of rest. Next time we'll forget the big name hotels and opt for Dockers. I love their beds!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet, great location, and wonderful staff!”
Reviews.Author: 2LittleVacation
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay while in Branson. It is not on the main main strip, yet close enough for all shows to be readily accessible. The hotel is clean and in good repair (a must for a positive veriew). The staff is wonderful, helpful, knowledgeable, and eager to assist in any way possible. High speed wireless internet access is available only from close vicinity of the lobby, but I was told that this will expand in the very near future. The breakfast provided by the hotel has waffles, toast and jelly, cereal, juices, coffee, pastries, and fruit - certainly enough for a good kick-start for the day. For the price, this hotel is great! I highly recommend you give it a try.

Reviews.Title: “I Recommend this one!”
Reviews.Author: MemePops
Reviews.Content: A very nice spacious room with extra nice bedding. The bed was not only attractive but very comfortable. The room was clean. The location is great. It is just off the busy 76 but close to all the action. It has a nice large breakfast room with a decent continental breakfast including waffles. The staff is friendly. Good value for the money. We would definately stay there again and would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: “Dockers Inn Branson helped make our stay fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: mcohlmiadds
Reviews.Content: On a recent family trip to Branson, we stayed four days at another hotel. We enjoyed Branson so much, we wanted to stay another night. Unable to stay at our current hotel we seeked out other hotels. All were booked due to an auto show. Then we tried the Dockers Inn. They too were booked, but the front desk clerk noticed there were a couple of rooms not bookable due to repairs being performed. The clerk went "above and beyond" to determine the status of the repairs. She did all this while being extremely busy with other guests checking in and out. After determing the issues would be repaired that day, we got two rooms for the weekend. I was extremely impressed how pleasant she was to work with and how diligent she performed her job! I was telling my wife that I wish I had an entire staff of her to work at my dental practice! As for the hotel, it was a fantastic hotel! The rooms were extremely clean and the beds were wonderful. Excellent service and clean rooms at an affordable price is all that I ask in a hotel. I assure you that when we return to Branson, we will definitely stay at the Dockers Inn. As a personal note to the front desk clerk ( I feel bad I didn't ask her name), thank you once again for helping our vacation in Branson be memorable!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for Price”
Reviews.Author: travelfamily2009
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Dockers Inn two times this summer and had a pleasant experience both times. The rooms are clean and nice, the location is great - it is a great value for the price.

HotelInfo.Name: Docker's Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 3060 Green Mountain Drive, Branson, MO 65616 (Formerly Super 8)
